About Us

We set up Whizzy Mops to create a modern take on cleaning homes. We have introduced a high quality cleaning service that will now run your basic errands on top of cleaning your home! Imagine a cleaner who you can message or call to take the rubbish out, post a letter or simply drop you off some milk? If your life is crazy busy or you just need a helping hand to maintain your independence at home then please call your friendly Whizzy Mop team. We pride ourselves on our attention to detail and our passion for excellent customer care. These values will always be at the heart of our business. So, if you would like us to clean and run an errand for you then we would love to help!

Home Cleaning Services

Duration varies • £14 per hour (minimum of two hours)

We offer home cleaning tailored to your needs! One off and regular visits,deep cleaning and we can even add in our bed changing service too!

Bed linen changing service

30 minutes and over • Price varies

A new service we can do for you whilst we clean your home! Just leave your clean bedding on your bed and we will change it and pop your old bedding into your washing machine!

Our errand service

£14 per hour (minimum of two hour) and £7.00 therafter . Valid within a 5 mile radius of your home.

If we are already cleaning your home you can simply add an extra half an hour slot for us to run you some errands!
